author: Stan Schroeder
title: Facebook's new 'Care' reaction lets you show love to friends and family amid coronavirus pandemic
description: At a time when so many of us are apart due to the coronavirus pandemic, it's important to show friends and family that you haven't forgotten about them. To help with that, Facebook is launching a new "Care" reaction on Facebook and Messenger. The new reaction…
content:
At a time when so many of us are apart due to the coronavirus pandemic, it's important to show friends and family that you haven't forgotten about them.
